飡字的基本解释

飡
cān
同“餐”。

飡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cān］
同“餐1”。
[②]［sūn］
同“飧1”。

飡字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　飡； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1416第07
【集韻】七安切，音餐。【說文】吞也。【韻會】俗湌字。　又【五音集韻】昨干切，音殘。啖也。　又【集韻】蘇昆切，音孫。水沃飯也。○按說文餐或从水作湌，後人譌省作飡。又餐與飧別，飧从夕，俗譌爲飱。孫奕示兒編，字音之譌，有以餐爲飧者，謂其讀餐爲孫也。

飡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
飡字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Food Character Department】　飡; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1416 Page 07
[Jiyun] Seven Anchor, sound meal. [Said the text] Tun also. [Rhyme Club] Vulgar words.　[Five-tone Jiyun] Dry cut yesterday, the sound is incomplete. Yeah.　[Jiyun] Su Kunqie, Yinsun. Water and rice are also good. ○It is said that the banquet is served from the water, and later generations will be prepared for the meal. Another meal and farewell to Jiao, Jia Congxi, the customary Jia is Jia. Compiled by Sun Yi Shier, the sound of the word "Zao", there are those who take the meal as the 飧, saying that the meal is the Sun Ye.
